Get Assay Matrix (Seurat v4/v5 Compatible)

Source: R/utilities.R
get_assay_mat.Rd

Uses `layer=` when available (SeuratObject v5), else falls back to `slot=`.

Usage

get_assay_mat(seurat_obj, assay, layer_or_slot)

Arguments

seurat_obj

Seurat object.

assay

Assay name.

layer_or_slot

Layer (v5) or slot (v4): e.g. "counts", "data", "scale.data".

Value

Matrix-like object.
